member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionClient
member.summary: An AppSync subscription client that supports API KEY and Cognito based authorization.
member.remarks: Implemented as per the protocol described at https://docs.aws.amazon.com/appsync/latest/devguide/real-time-websocket-client.html.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionClient.ConnectAsync
member.summary: Opens a WebSocket connection and registers the client with AppSync. Any existing subscriptions will also be re-subscribed.
member.returns: True if the connection was established, otherwise false.
member.remarks: Refer to for more information on how existing subscriptions are retained if the client is disconnected while there are active subscriptions.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionClient.DisconnectAsync
member.summary: Unsubscribes any existing subscriptions and then disconnects the client from AppSync. The subscription registrations are maintained (not disposed of). If a new connection is later established by calling or making a new subscription then all previous subscriptions will be re-subscribed.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Configuration.AppSyncClientConnectionOptions.SubscriptionTimeout
member.summary: Initial subscribe and unsubscribe timeout period. If a subscribe fails the subscription is returned in an error state. If an unsubscribe fails, the subscription is dropped on the assumption there is something wrong with the connection.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration
member.summary: Decorates the async disposable created by SubscribeAsync() so the caller can obtain the generated subscription Id and any errors that occurred during connection / registration.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Exceptions
member.summary: When not null, contains exceptions raised during registration, such as connection issues.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.GraphqlErrors
member.summary: When not null, contains graphql errors raised during registration, such as request/response mapping errors.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Success
member.summary: Returns true if the registration was completed successfully (no graphql errors or exceptions).

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.#ctor(System.String,System.IAsyncDisposable)
member.summary: Constructor. Used when a successful subscription is registered with AppSync.
member.param: The subscription that will unregister from AppSync when disposed.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Exception})
member.param: One or more exceptions raised during the registration process. These exceptions are typically associated with connectivity issues.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Response.GraphqlErrorDetail})
member.param: One or more graphql errors raised during the registration process. These errors are typically associated with invalid queries or request/response mappings.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.Registration.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.DisposeAsync
member.summary: Disposes of the subscription including unsubscribing from AppSync.
